sentences.english: Augus Partners is an international corporate advisory firm based in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 鳌智是一家位于北京的国际专业企业谘询公司。

sentences.english: Some consulting firms also offer computer programs to help mergers succeed.
sentences.chinese: 一些谘询公司还提供电脑程式，以帮助兼并成功。

sentences.english: Provide courteous customer services to all members and non-members in casino.
sentences.chinese: 为娱乐场会员或非会员提供优质谘询服务。

sentences.english: In the United States, Tzu Chi-New Jersey is holding its annual free medical consultation clinic.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，慈济新泽西举办年度医疗谘询义诊活动。

sentences.english: Zeljko Trezner, is an independent tourism consultant in Croatian capital Zagreb.
sentences.chinese: 崔氏尔是首府札格拉布独立观光业谘询。

sentences.english: We will be starting our consultation exercise soon and I urge you all to provide your input.
sentences.chinese: 我们即将展开谘询，我在这里呼吁大家踊跃发表意见。

definition: to amend an ordinance (abbr. for 修改條例|修改条例[xiu1 gai3 tiao2 li4])
Hong Kong Stock Exchange/abbr. for 香港交易所
to respond accordingly to/to adapt to/to cope with
to refer sb to an agency (or hospital etc)/referral
